snippet.title: Pokemon Weird Type Fun Completed New GBA ROM Hack of 2024
snippet.description:
Hi Guys, it's your boy MasterPoucine Here Where You Can Exchange with me...

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCF1pdDNPivt1_WQLjmwt7TA/join
My Discord: https://discord.gg/2468cRQmTP
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/masterpoucine/  

Description :
Pokemon Weird Type Fun is a simple rom hack with an even simpler concept: to have even series veterans be confused about type matchups. With 18 all new types and a completely reimagined pokedex to match, Pokemon Weird Type Fun makes the ever familiar Kanto a little bit less so.

While Pokemon Weird Type Fun sticks mostly to the core FireRed story and structure, some characters and lore has been changed around to keep things fresh. Event only areas (aka Navel Rock and Birth Island) have been made accessible through gameplay and a couple of new locations and small events have been added in.

Features
All types have been replaced with new alternatives. Type matchups do not mirror original.
400-ish pokemon, assembled from up to gen 9 (thus including Hisui and Paldea). Also includes a couple of beta pokemon and fakemon.
Each pokemon has been redesigned to fit its new type (think Fool’s Gold, except more nonsensical)
Moves and items updated to match the new types
Mostly faithful Gen III Kanto experience with some new twists

Download link : https://discord.gg/2468cRQmTP 
Source : https://pokehostel.com/
